Header: Indoor Cricket Facilities at Army-Built New Cricket Stadium Available in Dombagoda
Content: Turning a new chapter for promoting of Army Cricket, Sri Lanka Army Cricket Committee announced the opening of the Indoor Cricket stadium in Panagoda on Thursday (13), graced by Major General Bimal Vidanage, Master General Ordinance, and Chairman of Army Cricket Committee. Army Cricket Committee said that construction of two strips has been undertaken by the Corps of Engineer Service Regiment in April 2018 with labour assistance provided by many Army Cricketers under the supervision of the Chairman of Army Cricket Committee. Major General Gamini Sirisena, Provost Marshal, Sri Lanka Corps of Military Police and Deputy Chairman, Army Cricket Committee together with several Officers attended the occasion.
